content: Curious to if anyone has used fhirPath or CQL as a means to define the membership of a group or have any pointers as to how that might be done.

Here's an example using the cqf-expression extension:

{
  "resourceType": "Group",
  "id": "example-group",
  "type": "person",
  "actual": false,
  "characteristic": [
    {
      "extension": [
        {
          "url": "http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/cqf-expression",
          "valueExpression": {
            "language": "text/cql",
            "expression": "exists [Condition: Diabetes]"
          }
        }
      ],
      "exclude": false
    }
  ]
}
I suspected there may have already been an extension created for this. Thanks @Bryn Rhodes .
